The attribute must convert to a valid internal date.

Method.name: run
Method.Implementation:
attribute = @ME->init(parameters) if attribute->hasErrors() then return attribute
value = attribute->value
if $get(value) = "" then return attribute end
iDate = iConv(value, "D") if Status() <> 0 then attribute->addError(@ME->%ClassName() : ": " : value : " must be a valid date.") end else if oConv(iDate, "MCN" ) <> iDate then attribute->addError(@ME->%ClassName() : ": " : value : " must be a valid date.") end end
return attribute
